clip.quote: I'm not interested in a part-time agent.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights a pivotal moment that led to a major career decision.
clip.suggested_hook: What one client said that changed my career forever.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK (0:00-0:08)": "What one client said that changed my career forever.",
    "SETUP (0:08-0:18)": "This is about Jerry Wolking, a real estate agent who transitioned from landscaping to real estate. One client’s words shifted his entire career path.",
    "INSIGHT (0:18-0:40)": "Jerry was working hard to establish himself in real estate when a client bluntly said, 'I'm not interested in a part-time agent.' This was a wake-up call for Jerry, pushing him to go all-in, earn certifications, and build a reputation in the industry.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION (0:40-0:52)": "This matters because your commitment level can define your success. Whether you're new or experienced, going all-in can transform your business.",
    "CTA (0:52-0:60)": "Think about your own career: Are you all-in? Share your thoughts in the comments or tag someone who needs to hear this."
  },
  "CAPTION": "A client’s words can change everything. Are you all-in? #RealEstate #CareerChange",
  "HASHTAGS": [
    "#RealEstate",
    "#CareerChange",
    "#Commitment",
    "#Reputation",
    "#Success"
  ],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "real_talk"
}
```

clip.quote: There's always somebody buying something. There's always somebody selling something.
clip.why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to find opportunities in any market condition.
clip.suggested_hook: How to find opportunities in any market.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Ever wondered how some agents thrive in any market? Here's the secret to finding opportunities everywhere!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Jerry Wolking, a real estate expert who transitioned from landscaping to real estate, mastering market cycles.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Jerry says, 'There's always somebody buying something. There's always somebody selling something.' This mindset shift helps agents spot opportunities even in challenging markets.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) By focusing on education and certifications, you can enhance your reputation and uncover hidden opportunities in any market condition.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to level up? Start by joining a real estate association and expand your network today!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Discover how to find opportunities in any market with Jerry Wolking's expert advice! #RealEstateMindset",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateMindset", "#MarketOpportunities", "#RealtorTips", "#JerryWolking", "#RealEstateSuccess"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```
